xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.7 Hetuduka, Pītittika » 1.7.2 Sukhasahagatapada » 1.7.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Pītittika
Sukhasahagatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
248.
492Hetu sukhasahagato dhammo hetussa sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
249.
493Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
494Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
495Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
496(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.7.3 Upekkhāsahagatapada >>
